name: Open ESQL
short_description: Pre-compiler for C programs with Embedded SQL (ESQL), with capability to target MySQL, PostgreSQL, ODBC, and others. Can be used for new systems, or to port existing applications that were written using ESQL on Oracle Pro*C, HP NonStop, IBM DB2, etc.
